p: The median age of the cohort was 36 years (Q1, Q3: 32, 42), and 64% were females [ Table 1]. Overall, participants had advanced immunodeficiency, with median CD4 counts of 168 cells/mm 3 (Q1, Q3; 86, 232) and log HIV viral load of 5.1cps/ml (Q1, Q3: 4.6, 5.6). Participants with prevalent TB had lower hemoglobin levels (11.2g/dl; Q1, Q3: 8.9, 13), although this was not significantly different from the rest of the participants.
